snippet.title: Releasing My First Ever Pokemon Rom Hack!
snippet.description:
This was a project that I never thought would ever come to life with the knowledge I had back then up until now. My Rom Hack/Mod is out now and fully completed! Navigate to the Google Drive link to download it. Join the Discord to see the complete scope with details retaining to Definitive Platinum! 
If you encounter an issue, simply redownload the patch and make sure you have a Rev. 1 version of Platinum for the installation process.

Special thanks to @AgentOcelot for playtesting and helping me with the creative process in making decisions for the final version of the game!

Download the game here: https://bit.ly/3Y2u0zM

Music: @Mewmore @The_Zame 

Join the channel to get access to exclusive perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5vOFJMQCMyCTLXCIMIegqg/join

🐦Twitter: https://twitter.com/Big__Nation 
🤖Discord (Pokemon Battle Revolution + More!): https://discord.gg/qbjHWJr 
👾Twitch: twitch.tv/BigNation1 
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
👉Vods Channel | https://youtube.com/@Nation_Archives
👉Talks Channel | https://youtube.com/@BiggletTalks
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
#pokemon #romhack #platinum
